testimonials.name: Okuhle Gxotiwe
testimonials.desc: Ayesha is dedicated and very passionate about her work. Working together makes me motivated to go above and beyond to reach our goals and of course, having fun while doing so.

testimonials.name: Taahirah Ismail
testimonials.desc: Working with Ayesha is always a great experience. She's really well organised, remains calm in the chaos and pushes herself to produce work of a high standard. She's patient with those who need help and you can definately learn a lot from her.

testimonials.name: Ethan Oliver
testimonials.desc: From the first moment I met Ayesha I was impressed. Her dedication

testimonials.name: Waydin Jochem
testimonials.desc: Ayesha is an enthusiastic person, who is always willing to improve upon her mistakes. She constantly interacting with other people, learning different skills each day and often-times shares her skills with her colleagues at work.

testimonials.name: Meezaan Davids
testimonials.desc: Ayesha is a bright and dedicated individual who is quickly picking up coding skills. Her positive attitude and willingness to learn make her a valuable asset to our team. Working one on one with Ayesha has been a pleasure. As Ayesha's team lead I have no doubt that she will continue to excel in her coding journey.

testimonials.name: Timothy Barry
testimonials.desc: Ayesha is a student dedicated to her work. Since I have worked with her she has been nothing but helpful and encouraging.

testimonials.name: Asiphe Ndimlana
testimonials.desc: Working alongside Ayesha on several IT ventures has been an absolute pleasure. Her precision-oriented approach coupled with her knack for troubleshooting is highly commendable. She unequivocally embodies talent and commitment in her work ethic.

testimonials.name: Cheslyn Herman
testimonials.desc: Ayesha is a detail oriented person. She is very hardworking and dedicated to bringing his vision to life. As a classmate, she is always ready to help and there is a lot I can learn from her. Working with her motivates me to push myself and meet my goals.
